text:
Nosratollah Vahdat (; 7 September 1925 – 6 October 2020) was an Iranian comedian, actor, and director. He was born in Isfahan, Iran. His career began in 1950. His best known works were "Luck and Love and Coincidence" (1959), "The Doll Behind the Window" (1960), "A Passenger from Heaven" (1963) and "Yek Esfahani dar sarzamin-e Hitler" (1968).
Vahdat died on 6 October 2020 in Tehran from pneumonia, aged 95.
